name: places/ChIJw81WDAn0wokRvRmujS8R7v8
formattedAddress: 432 W 203rd St, New York, NY 10034, USA
adrFormatAddress: 432 W 203rd St, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text:
Title: Exceptional Service and Impeccable Results!

Review:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting an outstanding auto body shop that truly exceeded my expectations. From start to finish, their service was nothing short of excellent and delivered with utmost professionalism.

First and foremost, the staff at this auto body shop were incredibly helpful and courteous. They went above and beyond to ensure that all my concerns were addressed promptly and that I felt valued as a customer. Their knowledge and expertise in their craft were evident, and they were more than willing to answer any questions I had along the way.

What truly impressed me was the owner's dedication to maintaining constant communication throughout the entire process. It was truly refreshing to be kept informed about the progress of the repairs and to have all my queries promptly answered. The owner's attention to detail and commitment to exceptional customer service truly set this shop apart.

Now, let's talk about the quality of their work. The results were simply outstanding! The repairs were done in an expedient manner without compromising on the attention to detail. When I saw my vehicle after the work was completed, I was amazed. The craftsmanship was impeccable, and my car looked even better than when it was brand new! Every dent, scratch, and imperfection was flawlessly addressed, leaving me in awe of the level of skill and precision demonstrated by their team.

Overall, my experience with this auto body shop was nothing short of phenomenal. The combination of their excellent service, helpful and courteous staff, and the owner's unwavering commitment to delivering above and beyond expectations truly sets them apart. If you're looking for an auto body shop that delivers exceptional results and treats their customers with the utmost care, I highly recommend giving them a visit. You won't be disappointed!

originalText.text: I was so pleased with the service I received from this business. They went above and beyond with my insurance inspection. Thank you

originalText.text: Great work! Great price! Great team! They made my 2016 Subaru look like new after a collision. Work was done quickly and thoroughly. The staff were welcoming and professional. And they were true to their estimate which was 25%-30% less than the other shops we went to.

text.text: Great work! Great price! Great team! They made my 2016 Subaru look like new after a collision. Work was done quickly and thoroughly. The staff were welcoming and professional. And they were true to their estimate which was 25%-30% less than the other shops we went to.

originalText.text: Nice staff.  Quick and courteous.  Prices can be haggled.

originalText.text:
Professional and got the job done. Very friendly and would recommend to anyone of my friends
If your looking for a car collision and paint shop this is the place from the guys the work on you car to the ladies in the office everyone is very nice and helpful and also the manager pedro he is the guy you need to speak with, he will give you a reasonable price and also make your experience easy in this process. They will get a 10 on google review.
